questions.question: Why is clean topology important during base modeling?

answers.a: It prevents rendering issues during post-processing
answers.b: It ensures the model can be animated or sculpted without issues
answers.c: It simplifies the UV unwrapping process

questions.question: In which step would you use HDRI maps?

answers.b: Setting up the lighting and environment

questions.question: What should be included in the technical documentation during the documentation phase?

answers.b: Detailed development requirements for assets and interactions
